name: 張耀鴻
objective: 本課程內容包括組合邏輯與循序邏輯元件設計及其分析與合成，Register-Transfer-Level (RTL) 設計，可規劃與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，最佳化組合邏輯與循序邏輯之演算法，VHDL之設計與測試技巧，CAD軟體工具介紹。
schedule:
1 2008/09/12 Introduction
2 2008/09/19 Combinational Logic 1 - Boolean Algebra
3 2007/09/26 Combinational Logic 2 - Decoders and Muxes
4 2007/10/03 Sequential Logic 1 - Finite-State Machines
5 2007/10/10 Sequential Logic 2 - Controller Design
6 2007/10/17 Datapath 1 - Registers/Adders/Shifters/Comparators
7 2007/10/24 Datapath 2 - Counters/Multiplier/Subtractors
8 2007/10/31 Datapath 3 - ALUs and Register Files
9 2007/11/14 Midterm Exam
10 2007/11/21 RTL Design 1 - Examples and Issues
11 2007/11/28 RTL Design 2 - Behavioral-Level Design
12 2007/12/05 RTL Design 3 - Hierarchy Design
13 2007/12/12 Optimizations 1 - Combinational and Sequential
14 2007/12/19 Optimizations 2 - Datapath and RTL Optimization
15 2008/12/26 Physical Implementation 1 - IC Technologies
16 2008/01/02 Physical Implementation 2 - FPGA
17 2008/01/09 Programmable Processors
18 2008/01/16 Final Exam
